page.title: 14A FEN EDGE STUD FARM
page.content: {Hare Park}Stud Farm is situated on Allington Hilln in the south-east corner of our survey area. It is about 50 metres above sea-level and there is a thin layer of glacial gravels on top of the chalk. It is part of the Six Mile Bottom Estate and the present farmer is the tenant. It has been a stud farm for over fifty years and the present tenant has held it for nine years. The stud farm covers 30 acres which are divided into 7 paddocks and a stable yard. The stables are set around three sides of the yard and contain twenty loose boxes. They are built of wood on a brick base and have pantiled roofs. The stud manager has no employees to help him at all.
